alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 3:16PM CDT until May 30 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Nebraska... Republican River At Cambridge affecting Furnas County. .Widespread rainfall amounts of 5 to 10 inches have been observed upstream on the Republican River basin in areas near and west of McCook. This will cause rising river levels across Furnas County this weekend. For the REPUBLICAN RIVER...including Cambridge...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Republican River At Cambridge. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, The left bank overflows causing additional lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 1.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 10.6 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.2 feet on 05/25/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
